name: Diamonds and mud
description:
Diamonds and mud is my LD48 entry. 

DIg through the mud and find as many diamonds as possible. Make sure to have a way to get out of the mine since you'll need to empty your inventory and resupply food.

Controls

You move and dig with WASD, jump with space. 

NOTE: Updated version has a few of the below issues fixed. You should now be able to jump at any framerate, as well as dig even if your inventory is full.

Known issues

-Some issues with jumping in the build that does not show up in the dev version. Will try to fix this in a future build.

- Controls and physics are not working the way I want. You can do things you shouldn't be able to do :)

- Audio is limited.

- If your inventory is full, you can't dig while standing on a diamond.

- Health is displayed but there's no way to take damage right now.

Tools used

- Unity

- BFXR

- Affinity Photo

- Affinity designer

- Blender

- Substance painter
